Job Title: Snacking Segment PMO Connected Quality

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Job Description:

The Connected Quality PMO is a newly created role which will play a key part in Mars Snacking Global Quality Management. The role will provide program management for the Connected Quality program and drive progress across the various workstream. Connected Quality is a key transformation initiative to enable a simple, risk-based, digitalized fit for future Quality organization. The role will be accountable for governance and execution of the program workstream to agreed milestones. This role will also lead change management activities and stakeholder communications to ensure smooth deployment of Connected Quality workstreams within the Mars Snacking segment.

What are we looking for?

Minimum Requirements: 

Bachelor’s degree in business, management or related fieldMinimum 5 years’ experience in program management in a complex business environment

Preferred Requirements

 Program, project, and/or change management certificationDemonstrated success in the management of complex projects executed by complex, preferably cross-functional, globally dispersed, teamsExpert in program management and own the process of providing full detail of the program/project workStrong organizational skills and creative problem solver Excellent communication skills

What will be your key responsibilities?

Define, establish & operate key program processes, including program governance & execution, stakeholder management, meeting cadence, workstream reviews and tracking, documentation, risk identification & mitigation and communication to ensure strong integration across all workstreams and interconnectivity with related program and stakeholder forums.Oversee the delivery of the Connected Quality program milestones.Have a holistic view of program workstreams and can articulate progress and escalations, being the voice of the team to program leadership.Lead change management activities associated with Connected Quality workstream deployments within the Mars Snacking segmentWork with key stakeholders across global and regional teams to ensure seamless & efficient ways of working and communication.Provide support to the overall Connected Quality program and any other responsibilities as needed.

What can you expect from Mars?

Work with over 130,000 diverse and talented Associates, all guided by the Five Principles.Join a purpose driven company, where we’re striving to build the world we want tomorrow, today.Best-in-class learning and development support from day one, including access to our in-house Mars University.An industry competitive salary and benefits package, including company bonus.

Mars is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. If you need assistance or an accommodation during the application process because of a disability, it is available upon request. The company is pleased to provide such assistance, and no applicant will be penalized as a result of such a request.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
